TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CommandField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase

summary.span: 表示特殊欄位，該欄位會顯示在資料繫結控制項中執行選取、編輯、插入或刪除作業的命令按鈕。

span.span: Represents a special field that displays command buttons to perform selecting, editing, inserting, or deleting operations in a data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是資料繫結控制項所使用的特殊欄位 (例如和) 來顯示執行刪除的命令按鈕、 編輯、 插入或選取作業。The class is a special field used by data-bound controls (such as and ) to display command buttons that perform delete, edit, insert, or select operations. 要執行這些作業的命令按鈕可顯示或隱藏使用下表中所顯示的內容。The command buttons to perform these operations can be shown or hidden using the properties shown in the following table. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||顯示或隱藏 [刪除] 按鈕中的欄位在資料繫結控制項中的每一筆記錄。Shows or hides a Delete button in a field for each record in the data-bound control. [刪除] 按鈕可讓使用者從資料來源中刪除記錄。The Delete button allows the user to delete a record from the data source.| ||顯示或隱藏 [編輯] 按鈕中的欄位在資料繫結控制項中的每一筆記錄。Shows or hides an Edit button in a field for each record in the data-bound control. [編輯] 按鈕可讓使用者編輯資料來源的記錄。The Edit button allows the user to edit a record from the data source. 當使用者按一下 編輯 按鈕可編輯的特定記錄將會取代按鈕更新 按鈕和 取消 按鈕。When the user clicks the Edit button for a specific record, that Edit button is replaced with an Update button and a Cancel button. 所有其他的命令按鈕也會隱藏。All other command buttons are also hidden.| ||顯示或隱藏 [新增] 按鈕中的欄位。Shows or hides the New button in a field. [新增] 按鈕可讓使用者在資料來源中插入新的記錄。The New button allows the user to insert a new record in the data source. 當使用者按一下 [新增] 按鈕時，它會取代 [插入] 按鈕和 [取消] 按鈕。When the user clicks the New button, it is replaced with an Insert button and a Cancel button. 所有其他的命令按鈕也會隱藏。All other command buttons are also hidden. **注意：**這個屬性只適用於資料繫結控制項的支援插入作業，例如控制項。**Note:** This property applies only to data-bound controls that support inserting operations, such as the control.| ||顯示或隱藏選取的按鈕中欄位在資料繫結控制項中的每一筆記錄。Shows or hides a Select button in a field for each record in the data-bound control. 選取的按鈕可讓使用者選取的資料繫結控制項中的記錄。The Select button allows the user to select a record in the data-bound control.| 編輯一筆記錄時，顯示按鈕，或插入模式下的 [取消] 此外，可顯示或隱藏設定屬性。In addition, the Cancel button displayed when a record is in edit or insert mode can be shown or hidden by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 資料繫結控制項中資料來源控制項搭配使用時 (例如控制項)，資料繫結控制項可以讓您利用資料來源控制項的功能，並提供 自動刪除、 更新和插入功能。When a data-bound control is used in combination with a data source control (such as a control), the data-bound control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic delete, update, and insert functionality. 至於其他資料來源，您需要提供資料繫結控制項的適當事件期間執行這些作業的常式。For other data sources, you need to provide the routines to perform these operations during the appropriate events for the data-bound control. 欄位顯示的方式會根據使用它的資料繫結控制項。The field is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used. 例如，控制顯示欄位做為資料行，而控制項顯示為一個資料列。For example, the control displays a field as a column, while the control displays it as a row. 若要指定要顯示的按鈕類型，請使用屬性。To specify the type of button to display, use the property. 當屬性設定為`ButtonType.Button`或`ButtonType.Link`，您可以指定要設定屬性下, 表所示的按鈕顯示的文字。When the property is set to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link`, you can specify the text to display for the buttons by setting the properties shown in the following table. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||[取消] 按鈕的標題。The caption for the Cancel button.| ||[刪除] 按鈕的標題。The caption for the Delete button.| ||[編輯] 按鈕的標題。The caption for the Edit button.| ||[插入] 按鈕的標題。The caption for the Insert button. **注意：**這個屬性只適用於資料繫結控制項支援插入作業，例如控制項。**Note:** This property applies only to data-bound controls that support insert operations, such as the control.| ||新按鈕的標題。The caption for the New button. **注意：**這個屬性只適用於資料繫結控制項支援插入作業，例如控制項。**Note:** This property applies only to data-bound controls that support insert operations, such as the control.| ||選取按鈕的標題。The caption for the Select button.| ||[更新] 按鈕的標題。The caption for the Update button.| 而不是顯示在命令按鈕或連結按鈕，您可以藉由設定顯示影像按鈕屬性`ButtonType.Image`，然後設定下表中所顯示的內容。Instead of displaying a command button or a link button, you can display an image button by setting the property to `ButtonType.Image` and then setting the properties shown in the following table. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||要顯示取消按鈕的影像The image to display for the Cancel button| ||要顯示的 [刪除] 按鈕的影像。The image to display for the Delete button.| ||要顯示的 [編輯] 按鈕的影像。The image to display for the Edit button.| ||要顯示的 [插入] 按鈕的影像。The image to display for the Insert button. **注意：**這個屬性只適用於資料繫結控制項支援插入作業，例如控制項。**Note:** This property applies only to data-bound controls that support insert operations, such as the control.| ||要顯示的 [新增] 按鈕的影像。The image to display for the New button. **注意：**這個屬性只適用於資料繫結控制項支援插入作業，例如控制項。**Note:** This property applies only to data-bound controls that support insert operations, such as the control.| ||要為選取的按鈕顯示的影像。The image to display for the Select button.| ||要顯示的 [更新] 按鈕的影像。The image to display for the Update button.| 根據預設，當使用者按一下按鈕，以在欄位，在頁面上的所有驗證控制項上執行驗證。By default, when the user clicks a button in a field, validation is performed on all validation controls on the page. 若要避免驗證發生在按下按鈕時，將屬性`false`。To prevent validation from occurring when a button is clicked, set the property to `false`. 您可以隱藏藉由設定資料繫結控制項中欄位屬性`false`。You can hide a field in a data-bound control by setting the property to `false`. 欄位可讓您自訂其頁首和頁尾區段。The field allows you to customize its header and footer sections. 若要顯示頁首或頁尾區段中的標題，請設定或屬性，分別。To display a caption in the header or the footer section, set the or the property, respectively. 而不是顯示在標頭區段的文字，您可以藉由設定顯示影像屬性。Instead of displaying text in the header section, you can display an image by setting the property. 若要隱藏在標頭區段物件、 設定屬性`false`。To hide the header section in a object, set the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 某些資料繫結控制項 (例如控制項) 即可顯示或隱藏只控制項的整個標頭區段。Some data-bound controls (such as the control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control. 不支援這些資料繫結控制項個別按鈕欄位的屬性。These data-bound controls do not support the property for an individual button field. 顯示或隱藏的整個標頭區段的資料繫結控制項 （如果有的話），請使用控制項的`ShowHeader`屬性。To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control (if available), use the control's `ShowHeader` property. 您也可以自訂的外觀藉由設定欄位的不同部分的樣式屬性的物件 （例如字型色彩、 背景色彩等等）。You also can customize the appearance of the object (font color, background color, and so on) by setting the style properties for the different parts of the field. 下表列出不同的樣式屬性。The following table lists the different style properties. |樣式屬性Style property|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||子系 Web 伺服器控制項的樣式設定物件。The style settings for the child Web server controls of the object.| ||頁尾區段的樣式設定物件。The style settings for the footer section of the object.| ||標頭區段的樣式設定物件。The style settings for the header section of the object.| ||中的資料項目的樣式設定物件。The style settings for the data items in the object.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用欄位來顯示控制項，以編輯中的記錄控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use a field to display controls to edit a record in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CommandField2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandField2/CS/commandfield2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CommandField2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandField2/VB/commandfield2vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用， ，和屬性，以自訂的編輯控制項的文字。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , and properties to customize the text for the editing controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[CommandField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandField/CS/commandfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CommandField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandField/VB/commandfieldvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 將欄位加入至動態建立的資料繫結控制項時，通常會使用這個建構函式。This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control. 若要以動態方式加入欄位來資料繫結控制項中，建立新物件、 設定其屬性，並將其加入資料繫結控制項的欄位集合。To dynamically add a field to a data-bound control, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the data-bound control's field collection. 例如，如果您使用控制項，加入物件集合。For example, if you are using the control, add the object to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 雖然您以動態方式可以將欄位加入資料繫結控制項，強烈建議的欄位以靜態方式宣告，然後顯示或隱藏，視需要。Although you can dynamically add fields to a data-bound control, it is strongly recommended that fields be statically declared and then shown or hidden, as appropriate. 以靜態方式宣告所有的欄位可減少的父資料繫結控制項的檢視狀態的大小。Statically declaring all your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建構函式，以動態方式將欄位資料行控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to dynamically add a field column to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CommandFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandFieldCtor/CS/commandfieldctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CommandFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandFieldCtor/VB/commandfieldctorvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性欄位設定為`ButtonType.Image`，使用屬性來指定要顯示取消按鈕的影像。When the property of a field is set to `ButtonType.Image`, use the property to specify the image to display for the Cancel button. 此映像可以是任何檔案格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp 等等），只要用戶端瀏覽器支援該格式。This image can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client's browser supports that format. > [!NOTE] > 顯示取消按鈕影像的替代方案，您可以顯示文字的第一個設定屬性`ButtonType.Button`或`ButtonType.Link`，然後設定屬性。As an alternative to displaying an image for the Cancel button, you can display text by first setting the property to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link` and then setting the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要顯示取消按鈕中的自訂映像欄位控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom image to display for a Cancel button in a field of a control. 屬性必須設定為`ButtonType.Image`顯示影像的 [取消] 按鈕。The property must be set to `ButtonType.Image` for a Cancel button to display an image. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性欄位設定為`ButtonType.Button`或`ButtonType.Link`，使用屬性來指定要顯示取消按鈕的文字。When the property of a field is set to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link`, use the property to specify the text to display for the Cancel button. > [!NOTE] > 顯示 [取消] 按鈕的文字的替代方案，您可以顯示映像的第一個設定屬性`ButtonType.Image`，然後設定屬性。As an alternative to displaying text for a Cancel button, you can display an image by first setting the property to `ButtonType.Image` and then setting the property. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定自訂的取消按鈕顯示在標題欄位控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom caption for a Cancel button displayed in a field of a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定功能的按鈕時，是否執行驗證欄位按下。Use the property to specify whether validation is performed when a button in a field is clicked. 當這個屬性設定為`true`，預設情況下驗證頁面上的所有驗證控制項。When this property is set to `true`, by default all validation controls on the page are validated. 若要限制只有特定群組的驗證控制項的驗證，建立驗證群組，並將驗證群組名稱的屬性。To limit validation to only a certain group of validation controls, create a validation group and then set the property to the validation group's name. 如需有關驗證群組的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on validation groups, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以防止驗證功能的按鈕時所發生欄位按下。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to prevent validation from occurring when a button in a field is clicked. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定新的按鈕是否顯示在欄位。Use the property to specify whether a New button is displayed in a field. [新增] 按鈕會顯示一次在欄位，並可讓使用者在資料來源中加入新的記錄。The New button is displayed only once in the field and allows the user to add a new record in the data source. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只適用於資料繫結控制項支援插入作業，例如控制項。This property applies only to data-bound controls that support insert operations, such as the control. 當使用者按一下 [新增] 按鈕時，輸入的控制項會顯示每個欄位顯示在資料繫結控制項，讓使用者輸入新記錄的值。When the user clicks the New button, input controls are displayed for each field displayed in the data-bound control, allowing the user to enter the values for the new record. [新增] 按鈕會取代 [插入] 按鈕和 [取消] 按鈕，和所有其他的命令按鈕在隱藏欄位。The New button is replaced with an Insert button and a Cancel button, and all other command buttons in the field are hidden. 按一下 [插入] 按鈕，將記錄加入資料來源，而按一下 [取消] 按鈕取消作業。Clicking the Insert button adds the record to the data source, whereas clicking the Cancel button cancels the operation. > [!NOTE] > 資料繫結控制項中資料來源控制項搭配使用時 (例如控制項)，資料繫結控制項可以讓您利用資料來源控制項的功能，並提供自動插入功能。When a data-bound control is used in combination with a data source control (such as a control), the data-bound control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic insert functionality. 其他資料來源，您必須提供以資料繫結控制項執行插入作業的適當事件期間的常式。For other data sources, you must provide the routines to perform the insert operation during the appropriate event for the data-bound control. 當屬性欄位設定為`ButtonType.Button`或`ButtonType.Link`，使用屬性來指定要為新按鈕顯示的文字。When the property of a field is set to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link`, use the property to specify the text to display for a New button. 或者，您可以顯示映像的第一個設定屬性`ButtonType.Image`，然後設定屬性。Alternatively, you can display an image by first setting the property to `ButtonType.Image` and then setting the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示中的新按鈕控制項，可讓使用者將新記錄新增至資料來源。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display a New button in a control, which allows the user to add a new record to the data source. Public Overrides Sub ValidateSupportsCallback ()
public: override void ValidateSupportsCallback();

summary.span: 判斷 物件中所包含的控制項是否支援回呼 (Callback)。

span.span: Determines whether the controls contained in a object support callbacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法，用來判斷控制項是否包含在支援回呼的物件。The method is a helper method used to determine whether the controls contained in a object support callbacks. 類別不支援回呼，當顯示 [選取] 按鈕。The class does not support callbacks when the Select button is displayed. 已實作這個方法會擲回例外狀況時，會顯示選取的按鈕。This method has been implemented to throw a exception when the Select button is displayed. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。This method is used primarily by control developers.

exception.span: [選取] 按鈕會顯示在 物件中。

span.span: The Select button is displayed in the object.

exception.span: 當 [選取] 按鈕顯示時， 類別會支援回呼。

span.span: The class does support callbacks when the Select button is displayed.

para.span: 類別衍生自類別可以覆寫此方法，指出是否根據欄位支援回呼所包含的控制項。

span.span: Classes that derive from the class can override this method to indicate whether the controls contained by the field support callbacks.

para.span: 若要指出支援回呼，實作這個方法作為空方法不會擲回例外狀況。有用的訊息，說明為什麼不支援回呼，否則擲回例外狀況。

span.span: To indicate that callbacks are supported, implement this method as an empty method that does not throw an exception; otherwise, throw an exception with a useful message describing why callbacks are not supported.
